post:
We have a bit of free space on our nodes, and a lot of free IPs. I present to you...

**SimpleNode's Ultra Low End Box Special**
- Dallas, Texas Location (Incero)
- Gigabit Connection
- OpenVZ Virt.
- SolusVM CP
- Instant Setup

- 1 IPv4 Address
- 1 Shared Xeon Core (E3-1270v2)
- 64MB Dedicated RAM
- 64MB vSwap Memory
- 25GB RAID10 Storage
- 250GB Bandwidth

$3.50 per 3 Months

Direct order link: **(DEAL ENDED)**
@telephone Looking Glass: http://beryllium.node.simpleno.de/lg/

IPv6 is not avaliable at this stage.

**Note: This is our only plan that you cannot use the "SERVERBEAR" promocode with, as it's a promotion and a LEB exclusive.**
